Durjana! Kepala SD di Kapuas Hulu Kalbar Cabuli Murid Sendiri
03 Nov 2019, 10:25 by Tim detikcom
Kapuas Hulu - Seorang kepala sekolah dasar (SD) di Kapuas Hulu, Kalimantan Barat mencabuli muridnya yang duduk di bangku kelas 3. Pelaku berinisial SP (52) sudah ditangkap atas perbuatannya.
"Pelaku melakukan pencabulan terhadap muridnya sudah sejak tahun 2017 dengan murid yang berbeda," ujar Kepala Satuan Reserse Kriminal Polres Kapuas Hulu Iptu Siko di Kabupaten Kapuas Hulu, Kalimantan Barat, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Seperti dilansir Antara, SP melakukan aksi bejatnya itu di ruang Usaha kesehatan sekolah (UKS), di mana pelaku menyuruh muridnya untuk cek kesehatan. Sejak tahun 2017, pelaku sudah melakukan aksi itu terhadap tiga orang muridnya.
"Pelaku melakukan praktik kesehatan atas inisiatif sendiri akhirnya di ruang UKS itu lah pelaku lalu mencabuli muridnya sendiri," ujar Siko.
SP dijerat Tindak Pidana persetubuhan atau pencabulan terhadap anak di bawah umur sebagaimana di maksud di dalam, pasal 81 atau pasal 82 Undang - Undang nomor 17 tahun 2016 Tentang penetapan peraturan pemerintah pengganti undang undang nomor 1 tahun 2016 Tentang perubahan kedua atas Undang - Undang nomor 23 tahun 2002 tentang perlindungan anak.
"Pelaku diancam kurungan penjara 15 tahun dan saat ini pelaku sedang menjalani proses hukum di Polres Kapuas Hulu," kata Siko.

Wicked! Principal of Elementary School in Kapuas Hulu Kalbar Cabuli Own Student
03 Nov 2019, 10:25 by Tim detikcom
Kapuas Hulu - An elementary school (SD) principal in Kapuas Hulu, West Kalimantan molested a student who was in grade 3. The perpetrator with the initials SP (52) had been arrested for his actions.
"The perpetrators of molesting their students since 2017 with different students," said Head of the Criminal Investigation Unit of the Kapuas Hulu Police Station, Iptu Siko in Kapuas Hulu Regency, West Kalimantan, Sunday (11/03/2019).
As reported by Antara, SP carried out his depraved actions in the School Health Business Room (UKS), where the perpetrators told their students to have a health check. Since 2017, the perpetrators have taken action against three of their students.
"The perpetrators of doing health practices on their own initiative finally in the UKS room were the perpetrators then molested their own students," said Siko.
The SP is charged with criminal acts of promiscuity or sexual abuse of minors as intended in article 81 or article 82 of Law number 17 of 2016 concerning the stipulation of government regulations in lieu of law number 1 of 2016 concerning the second amendment to Law number 23 in 2002 concerning child protection.
"The perpetrators were threatened with a 15-year prison sentence and currently the perpetrators are undergoing legal proceedings at the Kapuas Hulu District Police Station," Siko said.
